metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29622 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in formidable v3.1.4 allowsattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted filename. NOTE: somethird parties dispute this issue because the product has common use casesin which uploading arbitrary files is the desired behavior. Also, there areconfiguration options in all versions that can change the default behaviorof how files are handled.

criterions.comment: node-formidable package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
